name: Genii of Children
description:
When in Rome you want to dig a hole... ruins come out...

Alair is a 12 years old kid who loves to explore ruins. He, with his little brother Telmo and their friend Antonella, are going to have a great adventure about ruins, ancient divinities named genii, and the meaning of growing up.

A visual novel with a minigame battle style in real time of click to the screen. All the chooses changes the conversations, some of them can change the story...

Three differents endings with different information, enjoy trying to find them :)
